PackageOracle.name: DA_TV_SCHEDULE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_TV_SCHEDULE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.23.592534000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,programming_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,broadcast_dt IN DATE
,broadcast_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,title_id IN NUMBER
,broadcast_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,programming_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,broadcast_dt IN DATE
,broadcast_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_tv_schedule;

body.name: DA_TV_SCHEDULE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_TV_SCHEDULE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.23.602503000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,programming_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,broadcast_dt IN DATE
,broadcast_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,title_id IN NUMBER
,broadcast_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_tv_schedule.add, parms=' || programming_service_product_id || '|' || broadcast_dt || '|' || broadcast_start_dttm || '|' || title_id || '|' || broadcast_end_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_tv_schedule a
(
a.programming_service_product_id
,a.broadcast_dt
,a.broadcast_start_dttm
,a.title_id
,a.broadcast_end_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.programming_service_product_id
,add.broadcast_dt
,add.broadcast_start_dttm
,add.title_id
,add.broadcast_end_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_tv_schedule.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,programming_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,broadcast_dt IN DATE
,broadcast_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_tv_schedule.del, parms=' || programming_service_product_id || '|' || broadcast_dt || '|' || broadcast_start_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_tv_schedule a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.programming_service_product_id = del.programming_service_product_id
AND a.broadcast_dt = del.broadcast_dt
AND a.broadcast_start_dttm = del.broadcast_start_dttm
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_tv_schedule.del');

END del;

END da_tv_schedule;
